exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (str0 : nat -> nat) (str_inj : forall n m : nat, str0 n = str0 m -> n = m) (str_prime : forall n : nat, prime (str0 n)) (n : nat), prime ({| str := str0; str_inj := str_inj; str_prime := str_prime |} n) H0 : forall (str0 : nat -> nat) (str_inj : forall n m : nat, str0 n = str0 m -> n = m) (str_prime : forall n : nat, prime (str0 n)) (n : nat), {| str := str0; str_inj := str_inj; str_prime := str_prime |} n <> 1 Unable to unify "{| str := ?M1529; str_inj := ?M1530; str_prime := ?M1531 |} ?M1532 = 1 -> False" with "primestream".

original: apply Build_primestream. - intros n m Heq. apply nat_ind with (n := n). -- apply nat_ind with (n := m). ++ reflexivity. ++ intros k IH. simpl in Heq. rewrite IH. reflexivity. -- intros k IH. simpl in Heq. rewrite IH. reflexivity. - intros n. apply prime_divides.
